alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:46PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Owyhee County through 715 PM MDT... At 646 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Chalk Hills, or 31 miles south of Mountain Home, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hot Spring and Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint around 710 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
